title: Hello World
description: Print a traditional greeting to stdout.
note: Demonstrates the simplest possible Koto script.
run_instructions: Press Run Example to execute the script.
how_it_works: The script calls the built-in print function to emit a line of text.
The final expression evaluates to a string, which the runtime displays as the return value.

tests.label: Testing guide
tests.description: Understand how to add assertions to simple scripts.
